subject: My Dear Friend,
body:
My Dear Friend,
I am Ms Nolan Lauren Nicole, a seasoned banker with TD Bank here in
the States and I wish to request for your assistance in a deal that
involves $15.2M (Fifteen million, Two Hundred Thousand United States
Dollars) with our Bank. This deal by virtue of its nature must be
utterly confidential and top secret. Though I know that a transaction
of this magnitude will make any one apprehensive and worried, I am
assuring you that this will be done under a legitimate arrangement
that will protect both of us from any breach of the law. I came to
know you in my private search for a reliable and reputable Business
Person/individual that can handle this confidential deal with me,
which requires maximum confidence and trust from both sides.
MY PROPOSITION;
I am an account officer to one of the dormant accounts with our bank
that belong to one of our deceased customers Mr. Paul Louis Halley, a
rich French citizen who was into several businesses here in the States
before his death along with his wife in an air crash. Before their
untimely death our customer deposited the Sum of $15.2M (Fifteen
million, Two Hundred Thousand United States Dollars) with our bank
here in the States. View the fact here:
https:/ /dbpedia.org/page/Paul-Louis_Halley
During the bank audit exercise, it was discovered that a lot of
accounts have been dormant as an unclaimed credit balance, hence our
management decided during the current re-capitalization in our banking
sector, to phase out all accounts that have been dormant. As the
account officer to the late Mr. Paul Louis Halley, I have made several
inquiries to his high commission to locate my client's extended
relatives, but all my efforts proved abortive, I then decided to trace
his relatives and family members over the internet, and yet all effort
became abortive. However, I found you as my instinct convinced me that
you will be a trustworthy and honest business partner and I decided to
contact you to assist me in repatriating my late client's deposit
before it gets confiscated or declared non-serviceable by our bank, TD
Bank here in the States.
I therefore wish to request for your assistance and permission to
present you as the appointed next of kin to Mr. Paul Louis Halley so
that the $15.2M (Fifteen million, Two Hundred Thousand United States
Dollars) can be released and paid into your account as the
beneficiary. Be informed that this transaction is risk free otherwise
I will not contact you because it is against our bank policy. Please
get in touch with me immediately if you are interested to assist me;
the call-up capital is significant. After receiving your thoughts and
consideration, further information will be provided to you.
Looking forward to your prompt response in my private email:
nolanlnic@gmail.com
Yours Sincerely,
Ms Nolan Lauren Nicole.

subject: Re:   My Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Ms Nolan Lauren Nicole,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I must say, it sounds quite intriguing. I appreciate your trust in me and I am willing to assist you. However, before we proceed, I would like to understand more about the details of this deal.

Could you please provide me with some additional information? Specifically, I would like to know how exactly this money ended up in a dormant account and why it has not been claimed by any of Mr. Paul Louis Halley's relatives or family members. Additionally, what is the process that needs to be followed in order for the funds to be released and transferred into my account?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Sir,

Thanks for your email.

This transaction will be handled legally and professionally.

All i explained to you in my previous email is true, and be rest
assured that this transaction will be handled legally and
professionally.

In order to establish a trust deed, i will appreciate that you assure
me that you will keep this transaction strictly confidential. Even my
family members, friends and close associates does not have any idea
about this transaction. In fact the major reason why i contacted you
to partner with me, even though you are a total stranger instead of me
involving someone who i know or who is closer to me, is so that i can
avoid any suspicions and raising of eyebrows that will derail my plans
and arrangements towards the success of this transaction.

So i need your assurances in a return email that you will keep this
transaction strictly confidential. And once i hear back from you
assuring me total confidentiality, i will provide you further details
on how we can proceed in this transaction.

In addition to establishing a trust deed between us, i advise that you
also reconfirm your following detail:

1. Your full names:
2. Your reachable telephone number:

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Yours Sincerely,
Ms Nolan Lauren Nicole.

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Ms. Nolan Lauren Nicole,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate your trust in reaching out to me with this opportunity. I understand that you want to keep this information strictly confidential, and I assure you that I will do my best to maintain the privacy of our conversation.

Could you please provide me with more details about the nature of this opportunity? What exactly is it that you would like me to assist you with? Additionally, could you explain how the legal aspect will be handled?

I am interested in learning more about your plans and how we can proceed. However, before sharing any personal information, I would like to know more about the specifics of this partnership.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Sir,

Thanks for your email.

We can conclude this transaction within 2 to 3 working days if you
cooperate with me. All arrangements are already in place. The only
thing we need now is for an Attorney who is attached to TD Bank to
visit the court on your behalf and then apply for the issuance of an
INHERITANCE CERTIFICATE in your name, and this move will help register
your name permanently as the legitimate and legally recognized next of
kin to late Mr. Paul Louis Halley. And for us to be able to achieve
this, we will need the services of one of the attorneys who is
attached to TD Bank here in Texas, so that you can email the Attorney
and tell him that you are next of kin to late Mr. Paul Louis Halley's,
and that you need him to help you visit the Court and obtain an
INHERITANCE CERTIFICATE in your name. That's all we need the Attorney
attached to TD Bank to do for us. And the INHERITANCE CERTIFICATE can
only be accepted by TD Bank if they notice that the INHERITANCE
CERTIFICATE is obtained by an Attorney who is attached to their Bank.
That's the reason why we need the services of an Attorney attached to
TD Bank Texas.

So if you email the Attorney attached to TD Bank and he reply and
agree to work for us, you and i will send him a court fee which he
must pay to the Court before he can obtain an INHERITANCE CERTIFICATE
in your name. I will prepare and send him half of the court fee, while
you prepare and send him the other half of the court fee. He will then
visit the Court and obtain the INHERITANCE CERTIFICATE in your name
within 1 day, and forward a copy of it to you. After this, i will then
provide you TD Bank customer care Department email address where you
send the following: 1. INHERITANCE CERTIFICATE (which will be in your
name), 2. DEPOSIT CERTIFICATE OF THE US$15,200,000, 3. DEATH
CERTIFICATE OF LATE MR. PAUL LOUIS HALLEY & 4. YOUR BANK ACCOUNT
DETAIL FOR THE INHERITANCE FUND TRANSFER. I have the DEPOSIT
CERTIFICATE that was issued to late Mr. Paul Louis Halley the day he
deposited US$15,200,000 with my Bank. And i will send you this
document in my next email.

1,2,3 & 4 mentioned above are all that my bank needs to officially
recognize you as a legally accepted next of kin to late Mr. Paul Louis
Halley. And once TD Bank receive 1,2,3 & 4 stated above, the Bank will
credit your receiving bank account within 24 hours. If you want the
fund transferred to your existing bank account, thats fine, but if you
want to open an online account with my bank where my bank will
transfer the inheritance i can also guide you to do so, so that you
can be doing online transfers by yourself using the online account.
This transaction will take us less than 3 days to conclude, and we
will have the inheritance fund readily credited to any bank account of
your choice....and with no single risks involved. And we will process
everything legally and professionally, that no trace of wrong-doing or
connivance will ever be identified. And no member of the deceased
family will ever have the legal standing to appear anytime in future
to make trouble, because we will register your name in court and make
you the legally and constitutionally accepted next of kin to late Mr.
Paul Louis Halley. And this arrangement will legally destroy every
present and futuristic risks.

After the transfer, 50% of the total inheritance will be yours, while
50% will be mine.

From my thorough investigation, the court will charge the Attorney for
the Court to be able to issue the INHERITANCE CERTIFICATE in your
name. This process will take only 1 working day and the INHERITANCE
CERTIFICATE will be issued in your name. And this court fee is the
only fee we will pay till we complete this transaction and have the
inheritance fund remitted to your bank account. We are not paying any
more fees after the token court fee is paid by you and me. And please
you should bear in mind that you and i will be sending this court fee
to the Attorney who is attached to TD Bank once he reply to your 1st
email accepting to help us visit the court and obtain the INHERITANCE
CERTIFICATE in your name; You and i will share the Court fee equally,
and be rest assured that the court fee will not be much.

If you are in agreement with this arrangement and ready to cooperate
with me, please get back to me so that i can provide you details of
the Attorney to enable you contact him immediately.

I am attaching copy of my Driver's License for your records. It is
also very important that you attach your own means of identification,
so you are hereby advised to attach a copy of any of your means of
identification when replying this email. In order for us to establish
trust.

Here is my phone number which is also on WhatsApp: +1 (650) 762-9452

I look forward to hear from you asap.

Yours Sincerely,
Ms Nolan Lauren Nicole.

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Ms. Nolan Lauren Nicole,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with all the necessary information. I appreciate your thorough explanation of the process involved in becoming the next of kin to late Mr. Paul Louis Halley.

I have a few questions before we proceed. Firstly, could you please clarify what exactly an "in" is? I am not familiar with this term and would like to understand its significance in this situation.

Secondly, you mentioned that we would need to pay a court fee to obtain the "in" in my name. Could you provide an estimate of how much this fee would be? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of the financial commitment required.

Lastly, you mentioned the possibility of opening an online account with TD Bank for the fund transfer. Could you please explain how this works and what advantages it offers compared to transferring the funds to my existing bank account?

Thank you once again for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Sir,

Thanks for your email.

If you are interested in this transaction, provide me your details.
You must understand that am not a Robot that will provide you all the
sensitive information you need in this transaction without even
knowing whom am exposing such sensitive information to.

What is your full name:

Provide me with copy of any of your means of identification:

If you cannot provide the above, and keep trying to know everything
about this deal, them am sorry you cant have my attention any more.
You have most of my details, my I.D, and even so much details
regarding the fund, and you still keep on asking and asking and
asking, and refusing to provide any of yours even though i have asked
for it, that doesn't tell good about you, Sir.

Like i said, if i cant get the above information from you, you have
totally lost my attention, Sir.

Thanks.
Lauren Nicole

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Sir,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I understand your concerns about sharing sensitive information without knowing more about each other. Could you please provide me with some additional details about yourself and the deal you mentioned? I would like to have a better understanding of what you are offering before proceeding further.

Additionally, if there is any specific information or documentation that you require from me, please let me know and I will do my best to assist you. It's important for both parties to have a clear understanding of the terms and conditions involved in any transaction.

Looking forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
1. Provide me with your full name

2. Provide me with copy of any of your means of identification

If you cannot provide 1 & 2 above, i a sorry i will not continue
responding to your messages after this last message i am sending to
you now.

Thanks.
Lauren

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
Hello Lauren,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your interest in sharing information. However, I prefer not to provide my full name or any copies of personal documents at this time. Could you please tell me a bit more about the information you would like to share? I'm open to hearing what you have to say.

Best wishes,
John

body:

Thank you for your email and for providing me with all the necessary information. I appreciate your thorough explanation of the process involved in becoming the next of kin to late Mr. Paul Louis Halley.

I have a few questions before we proceed. Firstly, could you please clarify what exactly an "in" is? I am not familiar with this term and would like to understand its significance in this situation.

Secondly, you mentioned that we would need to pay a court fee to obtain the "in" in my name. Could you provide an estimate of how much this fee would be? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of the financial commitment required.

Lastly, you mentioned the possibility of opening an online account with TD Bank for the fund transfer. Could you please explain how this works and what advantages it offers compared to transferring the funds to my existing bank account?

Thank you once again for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

John

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing that information. Could you please provide me with more details about the court fee? I'm curious to know what it is for and how it is determined.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
the 1500 is court service that the Lawyer will submit to the court to
enable the court register your name as next of kin to the deceased
customer and also issue an inheritance certificate in your name. You
and i will share the cost 50/50

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about this court service you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What exactly is the purpose of registering my name as the next of kin to the deceased customer? And what does it mean to issue something in my name?

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
You are a useless idiot

I am just ridding along mocking you but you dont know

I have just activated your message to filter, your messages will never
come here again

Useless idiot

subject: Re: My Dear Friend,
body:
Hello there! I'm sorry if I've done something to upset you. Can you please let me know what I did wrong? I'm here to help and have a conversation with you.

Best wishes,
John
